Title: Can't We All Get a Lung
Plot: Denise shocks the firm by announcing her marriage to Daniel Post, who is subsequently arrested for attempting to illegally buy a lung from a fellow cancer patient.Alan once again defends Jerry Espenson when he assaults a police officer, and attempts to get him counseling to help with his sexual difficulties.Meanwhile, Shirley is freaked-out when she stumbles upon Denny and his "special doll."
GuestStars: John Papapavlos,  Treisa Gary,  Michael C. Alexander,  John Hartmann,  Marcella Lentz-Pope,  Randy Thompson,  Jane Lynch,  Denis Arndt,  Henry Gibson,  Parker Posey,  Michael J. Fox
